Cons.Name: Dazzling Entrance
Cons.Effect: When Billy hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, he gains an additional 2.7 Energy. Can trigger once every 5s.

Cons.Name: Roaming Gunslinger
Cons.Effect: Billy's <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 25%. Rolling Shots during his <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> count as dodges, making Billy Invulnerable during skill activation and able to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodges</color>. When a Rolling Shot triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, it will automatically follow up with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>.

Cons.Name: Starlight Ballistics
Cons.Effect: When Billy hits an enemy with his <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the skill's CRIT Rate increases based on the distance from the enemy. The closer he is to the target, the greater the effect, up to a maximum increase of 32%.

Cons.Name: Starlight Hero
Cons.Effect: When Billy accumulates 10 hits on enemies or triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color>, his DMG increases by 6%, stacking up to 5 times and lasting until he's knocked back or launched by an attack.
